name: Mesenteric Panniculitis with Secondary Bowel Obstruction
chief_complaint: Severe abdominal pain and vomiting for 3 days
physical_findings: palpable abdominal mass in right lower quadrant
prognosis: Guarded due to high recurrence rate (40%) and potential for chronic fibrotic complications
description: A rare inflammatory condition of mesenteric fat causing encapsulation of bowel loops, leading to mechanical obstruction. Histopathology shows chronic inflammation with fat necrosis and fibrosis. Often misdiagnosed as malignancy preoperatively.
multiple_choice: Mesenteric Panniculitis with Secondary Bowel Obstruction
